source-layers.sql: SELECT a.the_geom_webmercator, a.cartodb_id, a.paws_id, a.park_name, a.status, b.lighting, b.other_planting, b.entry_gates, b.designated_bike_path, b.bike_racks, b.other_circulation_paths, b.ground_floor_retail, b.piers, b.ferry_watertaxi__service, b.boat_launch, b.public_access_easement, b.guardrail, b.public_art, b.interpretive_displays, b.trash_receptacles, b.handicapped_accessible, b.emergency_access FROM wpaas_v201810 a LEFT JOIN pawsmastertable b ON a.paws_id = b.paws_id::text
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, cartodb_id, park_name, link FROM publiclyownedwaterfront_v201810
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, cartodb_id, notes FROM paws_accesspoints_v201810

meta.description: Publicly Accessible Waterfront Spaces, NYC Department of City Planning Waterfront Division
